reviews.text: Budget Blinds of Flower Mound & Grapevine 2703 Justin Rd Suite 300, Flower Mound, TX 75028 Layered window treatments, like woven wood shades paired with drapery, can elevate any dining space. They help control light, add warmth, and create a welcoming atmosphere for every occasion. Explore our solutions!

"They replaced the shutters in the family room, kitchen, and the study room." "Could not be happier with the new blinds and the overall services received." "My wife and I are delighted with the quality of product and service!"

We are extremely happy with our shutters from Budget Blinds. They look great! The entire transaction was first class and hassle free. We are a repeat Budget Blinds customer.  Everything about their service is top notch!  Great quality blinds, and attentive customer service.  They were always on time for appointments and very efficient at installation.  Jeff did a great … More Response from the owner 3 weeks ago Thank you, Lynn! We're grateful for your continued support and thrilled to hear about your positive experiences with our team, especially Jeff and Justin. Your confidence in us means a lot!

Very easy process. Out within the week to measure and for us to choose fabric. Delivery and installation 6 weeks later. Installer was professional and efficient getting the job completed.  Will use again for future window coverings Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you, Caryann, for your kind words! We're glad to hear that the process was smooth and that our installer met your expectations. We look forward to helping you with your future window coverings!
